value: Bonjour, mon amis and welcome to the french revolution. Your name is ||name||, isn't it? And you've got a very nice ||creature||, even if it's not that strong yet. We currently are in Paris at the end of the 18th century and you have to help us to fight against the injustice of the nobility during the french revolution! Let's go around and check if there are any citizens who need help.
title: Condorcet:

value: Oh, look, there are three children being in trouble. A wild Souri attacks them. You have to protect them, hurry up!
title: Concorcet:

value:
Condorcet: Wow, that was exciting. *to the kids* Are you alright? 
 Pierre: Thank you for helping us, strange hero. My name is Pierre and this are my friends Fran√ßois and Gabrielle. We are from different parts of France and came to Paris for working and earning money for our families. We are very poor, you know? But now it's too dangerous for us to stay here, even if we aren't able to make money anymore. We want to get back home, but on the way there are lots of creatures, which can attack us. Can you help us to get back home safely, please? 
 Conndorcet: These unfortunate children! Be generous and help them!
title: The story of the kids

value: You agree and together you decide to bring Pierre at home first. But is a long way to Brest and the childs be tired early. You want them to sleep while you keep watch. Not long as they fell asleep something rustles in the bush in front of you and a wild Hugolo comes ot and attacks the children. To save the children you distract it and you are attacked.
You are save, but the children awake. You told them, what happened

Pierre: Pouhh, that was close. *sighs* 
 Francois: Wow, you saved us alone a second time! Your're amazing! 
 Gabrielle: Our hero! *hugs you*
title: Saved

value: The three kids and you continue west. Suddenly as you cross a little steam, a little orange octupus attacks you.
Something glistens in the steam. You stoop and find some money.
The sun goes down and the world goes darker. Somewhere on the silverline there are lights. From a tavern!
